name: Jungle Adventure!
description:
Jungle Adventure is a classic platform game with a journey of super boy that brings your childhood back. This classic game will make you addict to.

In the super jungle world, Sboy must smash enemies to pass so many threats. With familiar characters, Sboy World Adventure is such a childhood game.

In this adventure game, Super boy'll run and collect coins, power-up to fight with 9 bosses in 5 worlds.

Great Features Of Game

- Great graphics and music.
- 140 free levels with 5 worlds and 9 bosses to fight and more coming soon.
- Over 20 enemies and power up obstacles
